aboutIndex.paragraph: Hello, my name is Diana Chavez, I am Full-Stack Developer Jr and I have relevant experience in AGILE and SCRUM methodologies, I also have knowledge in different programming languages in Front-End and Back-End, I invite you to see some of my projects in this portfolio, thank you for visiting me, I hope you enjoy...

aboutMe.paragraph: I have knowledge and experience in some of the most important and most used programming languages for Front-End (HTML, CSS, Bootrap and ReactJs), and Back-End (PHP, MySQL, and MongoDB), I understand how the connection between both sides works and I am able to work with these programming languages.

resumeContainer.paragraph: Hello, here you can see the preview of my Resume, you can download it and contact me, thanks for viewing my portfolio....
resumeContainer.paragraph2: I am Diana Chavez Full-Stack Jr Developer looking for new challenges with all the desire to learn and grow as a Web Developer, do not hesitate to contact me, and thank you for viewing my portfolio, you can also download my Resume with the Download button at the bottom.
